startLease.title: Start leasing
startLease.leaseComplete: Your transaction is on the way!

qr.title: Share your address
qr.warningTitle: Send only WAVES and Waves tokens to this address
qr.warningText: Sending any other digital asset to this address will result in the permanent loss of your funds.

compare.title: Your transaction is on the way!

deposit.title: Deposit {{assetName}}
deposit.pleaseNote: Please note that the gateway doesn't apply any fees for this operation.

coinomatBTC.warningTitle: Send only BTC to this deposit address
coinomatBTC.warningText: Sending any other currency to this address may result in the loss of your deposit.
coinomatBTC.warningMinAmountTitle: The minimum amount of deposit is 0.001 BTC.
coinomatBTC.warningMinAmountText: If you will send less than 0.001 BTC, you will lose that money.
coinomatBTC.helpDescrTitle: Enter this address into your Bitcoin client or wallet.
coinomatBTC.helpDescrText: Once the transaction is confirmed, the gateway will process the transfer of BTC to a token in your Waves account.

coinomatETH.warningTitle: Please do not deposit ETH from smart contracts! Do not deposit ERC20 tokens! Only Ethereum is allowed.
coinomatETH.warningText: Check if your wallet or exchange uses smart-contracts to withdraw ETH. We do not accept such transactions and can’t refund them. You will lose that money.
coinomatETH.warningMinAmountTitle: The minimum amount of deposit is 0.001 ETH.
coinomatETH.warningMinAmountText: If you will send less than 0.001 ETH, you will lose that money.
coinomatETH.helpDescrTitle: Enter this address into your Ethereum client or wallet.
coinomatETH.helpDescrText: Once the transaction is confirmed, the gateway will process the transfer of ETH to a token in your Waves account.

coinomatLTC.warningTitle: Send only LTC to this deposit address
coinomatLTC.warningText: Sending any other currency to this address may result in the loss of your deposit.
coinomatLTC.warningMinAmountTitle: The minimum amount of deposit is 0.001 LTC.
coinomatLTC.warningMinAmountText: If you will send less than 0.001 LTC, you will lose that money.
coinomatLTC.helpDescrTitle: Enter this address into your Litecoin client or wallet.
coinomatLTC.helpDescrText: Once the transaction is confirmed, the gateway will process the transfer of LTC to a token in your Waves account.

coinomatZEC.warningTitle: Send only Zcash to this deposit address
coinomatZEC.warningText: Sending any other currency to this address may result in the loss of your deposit.
coinomatZEC.warningMinAmountTitle: The minimum amount of deposit is 0.001 ZEC.
coinomatZEC.warningMinAmountText: If you will send less than 0.001 ZEC, you will lose that money.
coinomatZEC.helpDescrTitle: Enter this address into your Zcash client or wallet.
coinomatZEC.helpDescrText: Once the transaction is confirmed, the gateway will process the transfer of ZEC to a token in your Waves account.

sepa.title: Deposit {{assetName}}
sepa.warningTitle: We don't accept international wire transfers from US Citizens or from USA Banks
sepa.countryList: List of eligible countries and IDs
sepa.step1Description: In order to deposit {{assetName}} directly from your bank account through SEPA transfer you must get verified by our partner IDNow.eu
sepa.step2Description: After you go through the verification you will receive an email with further instructions

header.title: Done! Let’s review
header.description: Waves is different — the wallet is stored safely on your device

body.security: I understand that my funds are held securely on this device, not by a company
body.backup: I understand that if this app is moved to another device or deleted, my Waves can only be recovered with the backup phrase.
body.analytics: I would like to help improve the Waves platform by sending anonymous usage statistics to the developers.
body.read: I have read, understood and agree to the
